description:
Variation of conditions U0191184 - Approved Drawings, U0191188 - Delivery, servicing and operational waste, and U0191194 - Refuse arrangments, of planning permission 22/2360/FUL, as varied under ref: 24/1707/VRC - to allow for the following amendments: Rear building commerical plant room no longer required, therefore area incorporated into residential unit 8; Rear building communal entrance relocated off the brook path, serving Resi unit 9 and Class E space; Rear building window fenestration on North-west and south west elevations amended accordingly; Front building front elevation - updates to window fenestration to align with internal layout; Front building rear elevation - Existing brick boundary wall cannot be retained due to buildability, therefore proposed to be rebuilt as new, lower than existing wall with obscured glass screen on top; 
Bin store locations for residential and commerical amended.
decision_conditions:
For the avoidance of doubt the Drawing(s) No(s) to which this decision refers are as follows:-

WP-0663-A-0102-P-L0_Rev P8 (Ground Floor Plan Proposed) 
WP-0663-A-0103-P-L1_Rev P7 (First Floor Plan Proposed) 
WP-0663-A-0104-P-L2_Rev P6 (Second Plan Proposed) 
WP-0663-A-0106-P-RF_Rev P6 (Roof Plan Proposed) 
WP-0663-A-0201-E-F-SW-NE_Rev P5 (South west north east elevation)
WP-0663-A-0203-E-R-NW-SW_Rev P6 (North West Elevation South West Elevation Proposed Rear Building) 

and the following proposed drawings NOT varied. 
WP-0663-A-0091-P-X Rev P4 (Site Location Plan Proposed)
WP-0663-A-0092-P-X Rev P4 (Site Plan Proposed)
WP-0663-A-0202-E-R-NE-SE_Rev P7 (South East Elevation North East Elevation Proposed Rear Building)
WP-0663-A-0301-S-AA-BB_Rev P6 (Section AA, Section BB Proposed)
WP-0663-A-0302-S-CC-DD Rev P6 (Section CC, Section DD Proposed)

-Operational waste Plan
-Refuse arrangement statement (Received 20.05.2025)


 received on 20.05.2025.
